definition: Granny Liu visits the Grand View gardens/(of a simple person) to be overwhelmed by new experiences and luxurious surroundings
pinyin: Liu2 lao3 lao5 jin4 Da4 guan1 yuan2

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，在物业把总阀门关掉之前，姥姥家发大水了。

sentences.english: Mother's old-fashioned quartz watch was inherited from my grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 老式石英表是姥姥留给她的。

sentences.english: Mrs. Geller: (to Monica) Your grandmother would have hated this.
I had two grandmothers, but I only knew one of them.
sentences.chinese: 我有姥姥跟奶奶，但是我只认识其中的一个。

sentences.english: Grandma sent a packet of sweets in the wrong?
sentences.chinese: 姥姥寄来的那包糖果在哪里呢？

sentences.english: She didn't reckon bad, the maternal grandmother wants to do of matter meeting in danger, must be so.
sentences.chinese: 她没有算错，姥姥要做的事会有危险，一定是这样。

sentences.english: How often do we visit our grandmother?
sentences.chinese: 我们多久去看一次姥姥？

sentences.english: Came to this city, only one person knows grandma.
sentences.chinese: 来到这个城市，只有姥姥一个人知道。

sentences.english: I am the apple of my grandma‘s eye.
Mom wet to grandma's home three days ago.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈三天前去的姥姥家。

sentences.english: I was only seventeen when grandma Elsie died.
sentences.chinese: 我姥姥埃尔西去世的时候我只有7岁。

sentences.english: AT once Baner set up a clamour for some meAT, but his grandmother slapped him and told him to keep away.
sentences.chinese: 板儿一见了，便吵着要肉吃，刘姥姥一巴掌打了他去。

sentences.english: Look for a child to her grandmother feel at home.
sentences.chinese: 找找儿时来姥姥家的感觉。

sentences.english: In my persuasion, sweet with tears in her eyes released her hand.
sentences.chinese: 在我的劝说下，甜甜满眼含泪地松开姥姥的手。

sentences.english: I was on the way happily by bike.
sentences.chinese: 我开心的骑着自行车走在去姥姥家的大路上。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
